title: Google\Cloud\GkeMultiCloud\V1\AwsClusterNetworking
name: AwsClusterNetworking
description:
ClusterNetworking defines cluster-wide networking configuration.

Anthos clusters on AWS run on a single VPC. This includes control plane replicas and node pool nodes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkemulticloud.v1.AwsClusterNetworking

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.vpc_id
params.description: Required. The VPC associated with the cluster. All component clusters (i.e. control plane and node pools) run on a single VPC. This field cannot be changed after creation.

params.name: data.pod_address_cidr_blocks
params.description: Required. All pods in the cluster are assigned an IPv4 address from these ranges. Only a single range is supported. This field cannot be changed after creation.

params.name: data.service_address_cidr_blocks
params.description: Required. All services in the cluster are assigned an IPv4 address from these ranges. Only a single range is supported. This field cannot be changed after creation.
